metadata.description: The Legend Continues! Super Street Fighter is the new generation of UDON's STREET FIGHTER comics, where fan-favorites like Ryu, Chun-Li, Ken, and Cammy are joined by newcomers from Street Fighter III and Street Fighter IV, including Alex, Juri, Dudley, Hakan, and more! All new battles, all-out-excitement, the greatest challenge for the World Warriors yet!
metadata.name: Super Street Fighter
